name: Chorizo Fundido
author: Chef John
summary: Bake this creamy chorizo fundido for an easy and impressive party snack. Garnish with chopped tomato and green onion and serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: ½ cup sliced green onions, white and lighter green parts (green parts reserved)
directions: Place chorizo, green onions, red bell pepper, poblano chilies, and jalapeno in a cold skillet
As skillet comes up to temperature break up chorizo into very small pieces
Continue cooking until sausage is browned and peppers are barely cooked through, 4 to 6 minutes
If sausage releases a lot of grease, mop up some with a paper towel
Mix cream cheese, sausage mixture, Monterey Jack cheese, Cheddar cheese, and sour cream in a bowl
Transfer to a shallow, heat-proof baking dish
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Broil on high until browned and bubbly, 5 or 6 minutes
